comment.author: 44124356048@N01
comment._content:
I guess the other three "Great Races" must be white, black, and everyone else from Turkey to Guam lumped together as yellow.

On the plus side, at least they called the woman a "belle" and not a "squaw."

comment.author: 40147761@N04
comment._content:
Please forgive me, I don't intend to offend.
The reference is to the vanishing Native American tribes.
I am amazed that in 1907 they recognized what was happening to Native Americans.
